ygData.subject: Re: Locked Book
ygData.msgSnippet: ** Possible Spoiler ** This is correct.  It is a quest item for a Wizard quest in Freeport.  Someone in the Wizard s guild wants the book back.  I believe the
ygData.messageBody:
** Possible Spoiler **

This is correct. It is a quest item for a Wizard quest in Freeport. Someone
in the Wizard's guild wants the book back. I believe the person you killed
was something like Lydl. If I remember correctly, you get faction, experience,
and a minor item (I think I got a torch).

Soren
TkAdam@... wrote:

> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 6/8/99 3:27:01 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> VorteksJRC@... writes:
>
> > Does anyone know what I can do with this?
>
> I believe that there is a quest in the Wizards guild in Freeport that uses
> that book. So I think it is a quest item. (not 100% sure ... but I remember
> a quest asking me to get a book from Lord (sombody).
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder
>
